titleStmt.title: The wonder of wonders: or, An excellent song of a six-legged creature. Tune of, Old Simon the King. This may be printed. R.P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for James Bissel at the Bible and Harp in West-Smithfield. Where any chapman may be furnished with all sorts of new and old songs.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Come listen unto my new ditty ..."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library and the British Library.

place.placeName: West-Smithfield. Where any chapman may be furnished with all sorts of new
